modName: A perk tree for the Lich (Undeath)
summary: This mod gives the Lich transformation from Undeath a perk tree of his own through MCM menu.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5pt]1: Description[/size][/b]
[size=3pt]This mod gives the Lich transformation from Undeath a perk tree of his own through MCM menu.
So far the re have been implemented a few perks that give the Lich more survivability. More will be implemented in the future.

"[/size]

[b][size=5pt]2: How to use[/size][/b]
[size=3pt]To devour souls acess the MCM menu Lich Perks in the buy perk points tab you can exchange your filled black soul gems for perk points.

Then go to the perk tab you are interested and buy the perk you want.

Note: Make sure to buy perks while in human form the perks are added/removed as you transform into a Lich/human.[/size]



[b][size=5pt]3: Compatibility[/size][/b]
[size=3pt]No issues were found in the current version.

It is required you place this mod after Undeath but before other mods such as SkyRe.[/size]

[b][size=5pt]4: Requirements[/size][/b]
[size=3pt]1-Skyrim and all DLCs (or else CTD at start)
2- Undeath
3- SKSE
4- SkyUI[/size]

[b][size=5pt]5: Uninstall[/size][/b]
[size=3pt]1- In console "stopquest lichperkq"
2- Save
3- Load[/size]

[b][size=5pt]6: Credits[/size][/b]
[size=3pt]Antioch for his great mod Undeath.[/size]

[b][size=5pt]7: History[/size][/b]

[size=3pt] 1.2 Corrected the bug through which acquired perks remained after reverting back into the original form. Hopefully Beta stage has ended.
1.1 Added an slider that allows the exchange filled black soul gems for perk points (previously only console commands worked), removed perks that did not work and added a perk to double death grip's damage.
1.0 - Added some perks
0.9 - Initial Alpha Release[/size]
author: Roxus13
